website_summaries.verdict: Very sturdy 100% cotton yoga strap from a brand trusted by yoga studios and yogis.
pros: This 8-foot strap comes in 8 crowd-pleasing colors
100% tightly woven cotton that’s more than strong enough to hold yoga poses
D-ring cinch buckle securely sewn in for worry-free holds during those advanced poses
Also available in 6-foot length, though most reviewers prefer 8 feet
cons: Because this is such a durable strap, it’s not the softest and is stiff to hold
Long break-in period to soften strap

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy GAIAM quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great price. As good as what you get in the yoga studio. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ShopwornAngel

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective yoga strap for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap is exactly what I needed. It's perfect for someone my height (5'4") and seems very durable. The grey color is great because its not too bright or an eye sore. The strap is about 1" wide and I find that to be pretty standard. For the price, I thought this was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Izabella G

customer_reviews.title: The extra length is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed a strap with extra length and this strap provided it. Well made and it takes all the pressure I put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Strong band
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would expect in a yoga strap. It’s sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and looks great! Very thick and durable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What you hope for!
customer_reviews.text: It's great. The material is durable. and has just enough friction that your hands won't slip, but it's not rough to be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Bowman

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This does what it is supposed to do and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia D.

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Buddy
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty inflexible but wanted to start taking up yoga. This little guy has really helped to improve my flexibility. It's durable and helps make me stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice for Functional Strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly functional, basic Yoga strap. It is 8' long, with strong and flexible webbing. The D rings are sturdy and are sewn securely at the end of the strap. I'm quite pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wandrwoman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful yoga prop for beginners. I purchased a Gaiam yoga mat and Gaiam yoga block in addition to this yoga strap. Necessities for a beginner like myself. I love all of them. I went to youtube to see how to use a yoga strap. Got great ideas there and was able to incorporate the strap into my very first yoga practice. Couldn't be happier with my purchases. Love them all and I highly recommend for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: LRobinson

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a little stiff. Other yoga straps that I've purchased from other vendors.have been softer. I'm hoping by washing it that it will soften up. I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Greyhound Friend

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and long
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these yoga straps and am well-please with the quality. These are long and durable and very helpful for helping me slowly improve my harder to reach poses. I own other Gaiam Sol products (cork blocks, rubber yoga mats) and have yet to be disappointed by any of their products.
customer_reviews.author: J review

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strap
customer_reviews.text: Great length and helpful in yoga poses. Definitely recommend this strap- thick and sturdy and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for your Yoga practice and for stretching first ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for your Yoga practice and for stretching first thing in the morning. You can use it throughout the day as well. Great material and strong. And I love the choice in colors. Gaiam has great products.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Banos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Don’t use as often as expected because we need 10 ft straps in class.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to help with my stretches
customer_reviews.author: SpookyNerd88

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I always get good quality from Gaiam and this no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry D

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product and it was reasonable priced
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and it was reasonable priced. I purchased this yoga strap for my yoga classes and use it at least three times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Zondee

customer_reviews.title: More suitable strap length for me
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased another yoga strap though that one was 6ft long but felt on the short side. So, I bought this one and found out that indeed an 8ft long yoga strap is a better suit for a 5'11" person like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Ramirez Chaves

customer_reviews.title: Best strap
customer_reviews.text: Best yoga strap for leg extensions, stays stiff and does not go limp
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: Wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: My bad for not reading the width as well as the length. Because it's wide it's a little stiff and not very comfortable in my hand or around my waist. Okay around the feet.
customer_reviews.author: DayOldPoi

customer_reviews.title: disappointed, misled thinking cotton and it's polyester
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because it was 100% cotton. the box arrives and says 100% polyester. Bad advertising. I don't like being lied to and misled. I also don't like returning unless it is necessary, it's time consuming especially during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa J Garey

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a mistake purchase as I thought it was something else but I keep it in my yoga bag and do break it out on occasion to challenge my stretches or if I need a deeper stretch it's nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: WallyWorld

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey, little small
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for a little piece of cloth. Also, you might want something longer as this isn't really enough to get a good wrap around your arms in a lot of positions.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my restorative yoga class.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my restorative yoga class. I wanted a strap that was sturdy, but I also wanted a pretty color instead of the plain white or black. This was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga strap.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on a more expensive strap. Love the color and length is good for me (5'6"). The rings are easy to adjust with one hand while in a pose.
customer_reviews.author: Greenie Mac

customer_reviews.title: The buckle loop did not hold as well as I ...
customer_reviews.text: The buckle loop did not hold as well as I had hoped and the strap was a little thin. I had to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Just OK. The strap was not as soft as I would've liked.
customer_reviews.text: Just OK. The strap was not as soft as I would've liked.
customer_reviews.author: EllenKT

customer_reviews.title: It's not the widest strap i've used, but it is wide enough, and strong - I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a very wide strap, but it is wide enough that it doesn't dig in my skin, and it's easy to adjust with the plain slip through double D ring buckle. This is exactly what I've been needing to get a better stretch through my quads. It's strong, and the D rings are strong - I don't foresee any problems with it. It fits well when rolled up in the little pocket on my yoga bag too, leaving me room for my keeps. I'm happy with it. I got the 6' version - I'm 5'5" and it is plenty long for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bugs

customer_reviews.title: IT MIGHT AS WELL BE PRETTY TOO!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful comfort and quality. Shades of turquoise, sea green and aqua--lovely colors running through it. Very useful and reliable. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These have a great feel to them and the uniform grey color is beautiful. They are a fine, studio quality!
customer_reviews.author: zoblio

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'4" and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday! I am 5'4" and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Chance

customer_reviews.title: ok, but rings slip
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this strap but found that it did not stay in place in the D rings - it slips a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Celery

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material. Soft and comfortable. The 6 foot length is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Terrier MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! If you have long limbs or like to use straps for purposes where you need a lot of length, maybe look for a longer one. But this has worked for me in every case!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra E

customer_reviews.title: For all your yoga/stretching needs
customer_reviews.text: Soft on my skin and the perfect length. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length for my stretch and yoga classes! The color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Harvest-Dreier

customer_reviews.title: Product as described! I got the 6' one and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as described! I got the 6' one and I kind of wish I would have gotten the longer one (I'm 5'3"). But that's my fault, not the products :p
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, nice color, and very helpful for stretching! This would have been much more expensive at my yoga studio. Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Miss G

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually pretty solid and weighs a good amount
customer_reviews.text: Meets my expectations. It’s actually pretty solid and weighs a good amount. You can tell it’s well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pclark4

customer_reviews.title: Quality material; good grip and length
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed yoga strap! It has enough grip and doesn't slip from my hands during yoga practice but it is also smooth enough to not be too rough on my hands/skin. I'm ~5'5-5'7 and the length is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina June

customer_reviews.title: cottony-soft, long yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: When I needed a second strap, I went for this one again: it is a cottony-soft, long strap with a sturdy d-ring.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnwords

customer_reviews.title: Good strap!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and material! I am now able to stretch into my poses much more easily! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aracely Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I love the D-ring on the end - ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love the D-ring on the end - so much easier to use than the locking slider that was on my old strap.
customer_reviews.author: St.PaulyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty basic piece of equipment but definitely helps to keep my legs stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and the right length for me
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. Sturdy and the right length for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T

customer_reviews.title: No complaints though on the quality or color - both are great.
customer_reviews.text: 6ft is a little short, should have bought the longer. No complaints though on the quality or color - both are great.
customer_reviews.author: V. Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Still a good item.
customer_reviews.text: Short for a man - had to order the 8' version to do some poses. Still a good item.
customer_reviews.author: Leon S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's very long and wide so it's super ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's very long and wide so it's super sturdy and because it's black it never looks dirty
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Good strap for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I think this strap is very durable and I imagine that I will have it for a long time. It seems like it is good quality. I'm glad there are options for colors.

customer_reviews.title: Strength strap works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is long enough for several poses. I would recommend this strap rather than a shorter one.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne

customer_reviews.title: Was a great gift
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend gave this to me for my birthday and I love it. Have never used many props while I practice, but now I do not know how I got along without it! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Thomson Jr

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I had one and got one for my husband. They do what I want, are plenty long enough and very strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga strap! Gaiam products are a no-brainer. I never have to question the quality, their products are fantastic. I also like purchasing from this brand, who is on a mission to make wellness and yoga accessible to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonkt

customer_reviews.title: Great straps...great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for others, but have a few similar. I was told they love the straps. For the price, these are pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: ... uses for the strap but so far its been useful in my practices
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning yoga and the uses for the strap but so far its been useful in my practices...

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. Easy to grip and doesn't slip. That's all I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga strap, comes in the right color
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, pretty much it is what I asked for! Does the job. I'm no yoga master, I just do stuff for fun, but it's helpful for some of the poses I do.

customer_reviews.title: excellent yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great yoga strap. very sturdy and useful. Provides great support intensifying stretch. Small and light in gym bag.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love. Not the thickest and softest, but great quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga strap.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfect length for getting into and holding yoga poses. Much better than using a towel or band.

customer_reviews.title: useful buckle, screen accurate color
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as it appears. Strong cotton, useful buckle, screen accurate color.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Not too thick, nor stiff (and the rings are not forehead smackers!).

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for stretching purposes, but quality of material allows for mutli-purpose uses.

customer_reviews.text: Ample length and good and strong for doing rehabilitation or yoga. Comfortable and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this little strap. It does what it is supposed to do and that is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Trubrit

customer_reviews.title: Great Strap / Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my lady. She's 5'2" in this works very well for her. Well made and she loved the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Simple and well made...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what people look for in a Yoga strap but this is a simple and quality made strap that has lasted and not broken on us so far.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I use it at home to improve my ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I use it at home to improve my practice.

customer_reviews.text: It's a yoga strap. It seems well constructed, and, well, strappy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Works as it should and a great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works as it should and a great length

customer_reviews.title: 3 but better long than
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely long for my 5.3 but better long than short

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for first time users
customer_reviews.text: Me, I love yoga and have been doing it for a while now. This is my new strap and I love it! I would definitly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday for post-workout stretches. Durable, lightweight and functional.

customer_reviews.text: I used it in class the other day and it was solid feeling and easy to hold on to. Good purchase

customer_reviews.text: What you would expect from a yoga strap, durable, nice color. Great price and I expect it will last a while

customer_reviews.title: it's very long

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.text: This strap is well made & will last forever. I wish it was a little longer, and I'm not even a tall person!

customer_reviews.title: Good length and isn't too tough or abrasive
customer_reviews.text: Durable and strong. Good length and isn't too tough or abrasive.

customer_reviews.title: Love this strap
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap, and the delivery of the package was fast! Especially in December around xmas time. This will make a great stocking stuffer!

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed and a great price. It's a simple cotton strap with a the ability to make a fixed loop.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, thicker than the straps at my local yoga studio.

customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as other straps I have used, but it does the job okay.

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap
customer_reviews.text: This strap does what it should for s good price. It's nice feeling, pleasantly colored, sturdy and a good length. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected in color, length and material. Works perfect for the legs.

customer_reviews.title: Long but durable
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely long and I'm only 5'3" so I may have to cut it! Other than that, this is a very nice strap!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and was very reasonably priced. Seems sturdy and will last many yoga sessions. Great for improving flexibility.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Long enough and d-rings are sturdy. The strap material is lightweight and may not last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, the color is exactly as shown and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It is sturdy, the color is exactly as shown and it doesn't bleed and there are no strings coming off. Overall good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green is good.
customer_reviews.text: this is just what i needed. I was not sure how to use it at first, but I got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Texidor

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple strap you need for usual practice
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple strap you need for usual practice. The buckle is not very sophisticated but it works fine. Cute colour and embroidery. For this money the best you can find.
customer_reviews.author: Vilena S.

customer_reviews.title: Great strap
customer_reviews.text: Great strap! Is sturdy and supports the limbs well. I recommend it for anyone starting yoga, or for a pilates strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne AM

customer_reviews.title: like
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for some yoga classes I teach. Everyone likes them and fits their varied sizes
customer_reviews.author: JAL

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strap to help with my hamstring stretches and it works great! Nice green color and definitely long enough. I was going to buy an 8' strap because my hamstrings are quite tight, but I'm glad I didn't. I am 5'8'' and can't touch my toes, but this strap is helping me get closer!
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice strap
customer_reviews.text: I like the Gaiam yoga strap. Great length, tight quality cotton weave and I like the study metal buckle. It is a bit heavier than a plastic one, which I don't mind and prefer. Has a very nice feel to it. Also love the apple green color. Ordered the same color yoga block. Shipping process was great.
customer_reviews.author: S.F.

customer_reviews.title: A Big Help
customer_reviews.text: Finally my husband began doing leg stretches before going to sleep. He had been suffering bad leg cramps which he could not walk out. So I got him his own Yoga strap. Now we both get leg cramps when we stir in bed, but they are fleeting.
customer_reviews.author: Greyhoundwalker

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This strap is a great prop for our yoga students! Great color and it works well. Happy we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Josie F.

product_meta.title: Gaiam Yoga Strap (8ft) Stretch Band with Adjustable Metal D-Ring Buckle Loop | Exercise & Fitness Stretching for Yoga, Pilates, Physical Therapy, Dance, Gym Workouts (Storm)
feature_bullets: Sustain poses for longer periods of time
Helps extend reach to hit hard poses
Available in a variety of colors
